system.description:
Large war drums that induce panic in those who hear their sound.

  • Range: Creatures up to 240’ away, are affected, when the drums are played. Those within 10’ of the drums are not affected.

  • Affected creatures: Are afflicted by the drums’ enchantment of fear: they must save versus spells or make a morale check with a –2 penalty (if the optional morale rules are being used—@UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.u9gtXY21VnjrwwkH.JournalEntryPage.4dfEUllNr02Vm7ze]{see Morale}).

  • Effects: Creatures that fail the saving throw or morale check flee from the sound of the drums at full running speed for 30 rounds.
